imgsToProjWarnDialog.title: Flat Image folder -> Manga Project folder
imgsToProjWarnDialog.text:
You have chosen a folder that contains some images.
Would you like to create a "Manga project folder" with these images?

gen_mask_all.tooltip:
GenMaskAll: Generate masks of all images
Caution - Previously generated masks will be overwritten.

genMaskAllDialog.title: Generate Mask All
genMaskAllDialog.text:
It can take a long time. Would you still like to create a mask for all images?
NOTE: All previously saved masks will be OVERWRITTEN.

rmtxt_all_btn.tooltip:
RmTxtAll: Remove texts of all images
If there are saved masks, use them. If not, generate them
before removing texts.

rmTxtAllDialog.title: Remove Text All
rmTxtAllDialog.text: It can take a long time. Do you still want to remove the text of all images?

genMaskBtn.tooltip: GenMask: Generate a mask of the currently displayed image

genMaskDialog.title: Generate Mask
genMaskDialog.text:
WARNING: Edited mask will be overwritten!
Do you want to generate mask anyway?

rm_txt_btn.tooltip:
RmTxt [Enter]: Remove text of the currently displayed image
If there is saved mask, use it. If not, generate new mask
before removing texts.

toggleDrawEraseBtn.tooltip: [T]oggleDrawErase: click to toggle draw/erase mask tools

penToolBtn.tooltip:
Pe[N]Tool: Draw/Erase mask with current pen size
[+,=] to increase pen size
[-] to decrease pen size
[Y] to change to the previous tool(Rect tool in this version)

rectToolBtn.tooltip:
[R]ectTool: Draw/Erase mask in rectangle
[Y] to change to the previous tool(Pen tool in this version)

panningToolBtn.tooltip:
PanningTool: Hold [MouseWheel] and drag to move the canvas
Note - button is not clickable(in this version)

revertBtn.tooltip:
RevertImage: Click to revert to unedited original image
Caution - Current image will be overwritten

restorePrevImgDialog.title: Restore Previously Saved Image
restorePrevImgDialog.text:
WARNING: Current image will be overwritten!
Do you want to restore previous image anyway?
